review: I already had the Google Chromecast, of course they compete, but they are 2 different animals, where Chromecast allows you to "throw" what is on your computer to the TV screen, Firestick allows you to use your TV as a terminal to access programming on your TV, it is very nice, and I see this, or something similar becoming the future of TV...
author: J. Morgan

review: Received my Fire Stick from Amazon, was super excited! From opening the box, plugging it in, connecting to my internet, I was watching Netflix in a span of 5 minutes!!! Just what I was hoping for. Works great, and very simple to navigate. And the price is unbelievable! My daughter has Apple TV, which costs from $99.00 to $139.00, and my Fire stick cost me $39.99, and does everything Apple TV does! It is a "no-brainer"  See for yourself!
